column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba is a perfectly fine restaurant
column2: but I don't really get what the big deal is. People wait and wait at this place for...what? Mediocre tapas and overpriced booze? I know I'm in the minority because
column4: everyone else LOVES this joint. I just don't think it's that amazing
column5: and it's certainly not worth waiting for a table.
